name: Janni Style

sections.name: Prerequisites
sections.description: Improved Unarmed Strike, Acrobatics 3 ranks, Perform (dance) 3 ranks.

sections.body: While using this style, you take only a –1 penalty to AC for charging. Further, opponents that flank you gain only a +1 bonus on attack rolls against you.
sections.name: Benefits

description: Your whirling fighting technique makes you difficult to hit.
